xmlText.p: Second Period_1, Detroit, Frk 9 (Kronwall, Zetterberg), 2:08 (pp). 2, Boston, Kuraly 4 (Pastrnak, Heinen), 12:11. 3, Boston, Krejci 10 (Spooner, DeBrusk), 14:17. Penalties_McAvoy, BOS, (hooking), 1:20; Abdelkader, DET, (roughing), 19:37; Bergeron, BOS, (roughing), 19:37.
